text.section:
Subject to subsection (c) of this section, the Board shall license any applicant who meets the requirements for a license as:
A registered nurse under this title; or
A licensed practical nurse under this title.

section.section:
The Board shall:
Issue each new licensee a license number and registration certificate that indicates that the initial license was issued by the Board; and
Electronically record each license in the Board's database and on the Board's website.

Each license shall include:
Any expiration date;
The type of license; and
Any certification.

Except as provided in subparagraph (ii) of this paragraph, the Board may not issue a license or a certificate if the criminal history record information required under § 8-303 of this subtitle has not been received.
The Board may grant a 90-day extension of a temporary license pending receipt of criminal history record information.
